text: Jim Tibballs (23 September 1922 – 13 December 1959) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Profile on Collingwood Forever Category:1922 births Category:1959 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Jim Tibballs
